name: Din of Sen
description:
Din of Sen

There is no combat in this demo unless you count destroying pots. This is mostly to get feedback on game feel, level design, atmosphere, etc.

Follow my Twitter for regular updates:

https://twitter.com/LacopaEspy

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move/interact (up to change zones at doors)

Space to jump

Alt to dash

Shift to attack

Esc for menu

Things I'm aware of:

Wall jumping is buggy

Ladder climbing is buggy

Dashing is buggy

Some animations are missing/unfinished

Slope collision sometimes doesn't work (jump to fix)
